title: TFT tier unlocks not working
body:
Is anyone else having trouble with the mission unlock tiers for TFT not working?
I have almost reached tier 3 but still, have not received the tier 2 map.

replies.body: It has been about 24 hours since I reached T2 in teamfight tactics rewards, but I still don't have my arena's unlocked. I got my second orb of enlightenment and the T3 icon, but all I want is the arena color. I have seen ONE person with it on, in all my games.

So I just claimed mine and it appears to have unlocked straight away. My first suggestion is to do a quick relog. If you still don't have it, submit a ticket to players support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) letting them know what the deal is. It's possible some loot items are just being delayed, it's certainly happened before with big releases like this.

Support likely has a high volume of requests at the moment so be patient, they should get back to you within 48 hours. Don't bump/reply to your ticket until they get back to you (unless you need to give them more info) because it will drop you back to the bottom of the queue.
Missions earn you points, points earn you tiers. I'm pretty sure there's no way for you to be at tier 3 yet. You can't even make tier 1 from this week's missions.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BOToFGfT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-26T15:05:42.277+0000)
>
> Missions earn you points, points earn you tiers. I'm pretty sure there's no way for you to be at tier 3 yet. You can't even make tier 1 from this week's missions.

I'm tier 3. The missions reset once you finish them lmao. Weekly is a lie. They keep resetting.
Then I obviously haven't played enough! I also just discovered how the orb of enlightenment works and hit tier 1. I take it all back!

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BOToFGfT,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-27T04:29:31.781+0000)
>
> Then I obviously haven't played enough! I also just discovered how the orb of enlightenment works and hit tier 1. I take it all back!

can you explain how the orb of enlightenment works?

Thanks!

Well, sort of. So I'm not super sure how you power it up, whether it's meant to be wins and mine hasn't updated or just games played and it's bugged or it's something else entirely, but it's basically like a first win of the day that you get at the end instead of the beginning. (This was what confused me cause ti started with a timer). I opened one and got like 50 points from it.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BOToFGfT,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-27T15:16:19.168+0000)
>
> Well, sort of. So I'm not super sure how you power it up, whether it's meant to be wins and mine hasn't updated or just games played and it's bugged or it's something else entirely, but it's basically like a first win of the day that you get at the end instead of the beginning. (This was what confused me cause ti started with a timer). I opened one and got like 50 points from it.

I think you're meant to play five games per day and it 'powers' it up. However, I assume it's bugged right now.

The perils of WIP :) In saying that, I got 80 from this orb (50 from the last) and had played more games, so I think perhaps it's just 50 base, 10 per power up (games played) and just the visuals aren't working.

If you notice yours changing (or if you get 100) I'd appreciate a heads up :)

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BOToFGfT,comment-id=0000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2019-06-28T09:52:18.190+0000)
>
> The perils of WIP :) In saying that, I got 80 from this orb (50 from the last) and had played more games, so I think perhaps it's just 50 base, 10 per power up (games played) and just the visuals aren't working.
> 
> If you notice yours changing (or if you get 100) I'd appreciate a heads up :)

I will let you know! I had no idea and was just collecting it whenever I could. Shame.

So after 2 more orbs of experimentation, I think they might have just upped the amount the orb gives (or maybe the first one just gets less?) because I've gotten 80 the last two times regardless of how many games played.

I suppose the big COMING SOON didn't lie and we'll just have to wait :)

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BOToFGfT,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-27T15:16:19.168+0000)
>
> Well, sort of. So I'm not super sure how you power it up, whether it's meant to be wins and mine hasn't updated or just games played and it's bugged or it's something else entirely, but it's basically like a first win of the day that you get at the end instead of the beginning. (This was what confused me cause ti started with a timer). I opened one and got like 50 points from it.

oh thanks anyways!
Yeah im almost at tier 3, and my tier 2 maps havent unlocked either. Not sure if its bugged

Loot can often be delayed, you may also have to redeem it in your loot like you do the egg but not sure on that one as I haven't made it that far.

If it doesn't show up in 24~ hours submit a ticket :)
Play 5 games then redeem the orb

> [{quoted}](name=Socon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BOToFGfT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-28T01:47:09.015+0000)
>
> Play 5 games then redeem the orb

alright ill try it! redeemed my first one with no games play which mightve been a mistake
